nodes.text: Rossum Droidworks (R.D.W.) was a droid-manufacturing company created and owned by Iaco Stark after the Clone Wars following his departure from the Commerce Guild. He bought droidekas and similar droids whereupon he created R.D.W. in the Corporate Sector where he began selling them. This led to him amassing a fortune in wealth.

During the Imperial Period, the company was a major client of Imperial Commandant Milosh Muhrlein where they were working on a secret project designated Iron Eclipse. In this time, Imperial Intelligence agent Jahan Cross discovered the link between Muhrlein and R.D.W. whereupon he departed to the Corporate Sector to uncover more about the Iron Eclipse project.
